clean_data: Scrum Master Scrum Master Scrum Master Dell Inc A lean Agile change agent and experience Scrum Master with over 4 years plus of handson experience working with teams and leading organizations in lean Agile transformation Expert in facilitating mentoring coaching and ability to motivate lead and organize Scrum teams in delivering high quality valuable software in the shortest sustainable lead time Ability to work in a fastpaced and other robust environments with outstanding communication skills Excellent facilitator Servant leader and team player Expert in leading and demonstrating the values of Agile principles Outstanding written and oral communication skills with experience interacting with and coordinating multiple development teams Management skills including problem solving critical thinking and decision making Ability to react to change productively and positively in a fastpaced fluid environment Highly analytical and detail oriented Ability to work independently and in a teamoriented environment Work Experience Scrum Master Dell Inc August 2018 to Present Responsibilities Work closely with multiple Scrum Masters teams and Product Owners to ensure execution of scaled Agile consistent with the Enterprise Business Delivery Model Guiding teams on how to get the most out of self organization Building a trusting and safe environment where problems can be raised without fear of blame retribution or judgment with an emphasis on learning and problem solving Guide teams to focus on value driven development Supports team building and team development by utilizing the abilities and skills of individuals and fostering a feedback culture Facilitates Agile team for scope grooming estimation and planning activities to ensure teams approach will deliver desired business value Removing impediments to sprint work and shielding teams from outside distractions and resource demands Fosters normalized estimating within the team Helps teams operate under architectural and portfolio governance system level integration and system Demos Assist RTE in PI readiness and PI planning Help teams write smart Team PI and Stretch objectives Challenge the team to exceed their previous accomplishments Assisting with internal and external communication and improving transparency Create a transparent team environment by providing visibility on team metrics successes improvements challenges and opportunities to the stakeholders and management Supporting and educating the Product owner especially with respect to grooming prioritization and maintaining healthy product backlogs Facilitating scrum activities including sprint planning retrospectives and daily standups Enacting change continuous improvement to increase the productivity of the team and quality of deliverables Protect the Sprint Backlog from scope creep Tools Jira confluence SharePoint MD Wells Fargo May 2017 to July 2018 Scrum Master Responsibilities Participate in the planning and coordination of our Scrum of Scrums Ensure the teams are internalizing the core Agile valuesprinciples and other best practices maturing in selforganization collaboration business prioritization team accountability and transparency toward the consistent delivery of working product Expose teams to innovative thinking and bring ideas from the Agile community to increase agility leveraging other Agile thinking Assist the Product Owner in maintaining a healthy backlog by consistently grooming and prioritizing the backlog Facilitating sprint planning and ensuring team have all information needed to size user Story writing with good Acceptance Criteria Assist the team with making appropriate commitments through relative backlog sizing sprint story selection task definition Facilitate the removal of impediments Facilitate discussion and conflict resolution Shield and improve team dynamics Facilitate all Scrum events including Sprint Planning daily Scrum Meetings Sprint Reviews and Sprint Retrospectives Manage team schedule to ensure all team member vacation days and company holidays are factored in capacity allocation Collaborating with other teams in the Agile Release train to manage cross dependencies Foster adoption of Safe values and principles Assist PO in preparing and refining the backlog for PI and iteration planning Coordinate with other scrum masters the system Team and shared services in the ART PI planning events Coordinate with other Scrum Masters and Release Train and Engineer in the scrum of scrums Help Product Owner with prioritization risk management and scope Lead working session meetings to discuss scope schedule and requirements with product owners Improve team performance by coaching them on various agile techniques such as Automated Testing Continuous Integration Continuous Delivery and Manage product quality Work with stakeholders to accurately report progress risks successes and failures Maintain a close working relationship with the product owner scrum team and other stake holders Foster collaboration and communication between team members on technical issues on process improvements and in addressing and escalating project Tools Jira confluence SharePoint Oracle Database Administrator Sprint Overland Park KS January 2015 to April 2016 Responsibilities Install oracle database software 9201 10201 and 111060 using oracle universal installer on development test and production server for their claim policy and online applications in IBM AIX 53 environment Install OEM grid control that includes oracle agent management repository and management service on VMware Red Hat Linux virtual machine Install agents on various AIX database servers Upgrade software and databases from 9201 to
